comment: Aman bhai the most playful and bkc guy. Makes us laugh by his foolery always and ham teen bhai teeno tabahi co founder. The most passionate and disciplined. Milna toh har saal hai bhai . A lot of memories made and still to make.

comment: Thank you mere yarr mere andar itna confidene laane ke liye. Agar tu na hota toh shayad mai apne college ke kuch acche pal jee hi nhi paata.
